definitions.text: the content of cognition; the main thing you are thinking about
examples: it was not a good idea
the thought never entered my mind

definitions.text: your intention; what you intend to do
examples: he had in mind to see his old teacher
the idea of the game is to capture all the pieces
he has an idea that we don't like him

definitions.text: an approximate calculation of quantity or degree or worth
examples: an estimate of what it would cost
a rough idea how long it would take

definitions.text: (music) melodic subject of a musical composition
examples: the theme is announced in the first measures
the accompanist picked up the idea and elaborated it
